text: Turkmenistan has been in 4 Summer Olympics. The first time was in 1996. They have never been in the Winter Olympics. Turkmen athletes were with the Soviet Union and the Unified Team. Turkmenistan's capital, Ashgabat, has an Olympic Stadium even though they have not hosted the Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee of Turkmenistan was formed in 1990. It was recognized by the IOC in 1993. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * Turkmenistan profile at London2012.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:Turkmenistan
title: Turkmenistan at the Olympics
